mapper.select: select * from comments where nt_no=#{nt_no} order by cm_date asc
mapper.insert: insert into comments (users_no, mg_no, cm_con, cm_no, cm_date, nt_no, users_name) values(#{users_no}, #{mg_no}, #{cm_con}, 'CM_23_' || LPAD((SEQ_CM.NEXTVAL),3,'0'), sysdate, #{nt_no}, #{users_name})
mapper.select: select users_name from (select users_name, users_no from users union all select mg_name, mg_no from manager) where users_no=#{users_no}
